thread.title: FRIDAY’S TOP PERFOMANCES

title: FRIDAY’S TOP PERFOMANCES
text:
By Andy Shupe Credit: NWA Democrat-Gazette Luke Hannon of Springdale Har-Ber holds up the football after scoring a touchdown during the first half of Friday’s game against Fayetteville at Wildcat Stadium in Springdale. Visit nwadg.com/photos to see more photographs from the game. 
CLASS 7A 
DARIUS AUSTIN, NLR, 10-113 rushing 
JARROD BARNES, Cabot, 8-93 rushing, 2 TDs 
CONNOR DAIGLE, Cabot, 1 INT, 1 punt block 
ALEX DAY, NLR, 28-180 rushing, 2 TDs 
MAX FRAZIER, FS Northside, 18-140 rushing, 1 TD; 6-13-122 passing, 1 TD 
LUKE HANNON, Springdale Har-Ber, 45-318 rushing, 4 TDs; 1 TD receiving 
ALEX ROBERTS, Cabot, 30-117 rushing, 2 TDs 
CLASS 6A 
BROCKTON BROWN, Sheridan, 27-197 rushing, 1 TD 
LUKE DIXON, Searcy, 31-162 rushing, 2 TDs 
DREW DYER, Benton, 10-173 receiving, 2 TDs 
DAYLON HOOD, Greenwood, 18-125 rushing, 2 TDs 
KOILAN JACKSON, LR Parkview, 12-18 passing, 224, 2 TDs; 17-30 rushing, 2 TDs 
CASON MAERTENS, Benton, 19-31 passing, 298, 3 TDs 
CADEN MARTIN, Greenwood, 19-103 rushing, 3TDs 
ANDREW NEAVILLE. Searcy, 13-24 passing, 165; 2 rushing TDs

JACOB ACKLIN, Maumelle, 25-226 rushing, 3 TDs 
KAHLIL ANTHONY, Beebe, 12-163 rushing, 2 TDs

JOE FRAZIER, Nettleton, 23-183 rushing, 2 TDs 
LAYNE HATCHER, Pulaski Academy, 27-41 passing, 506, 3 TDs 
DEMARIAN JOHNSON, Maumelle, 14-22 passing, 148, 1 TD 
ZACH KELLEY, Pulaski Academy, 2 TD receptions, 67, 43 yards 
KANON KIRKLAND, Harrison, 4 TDs, including 3 in the first quarter 
DESMOND MOORE, Blytheville, 7-13-113 passing, 102 rushing 
ETHAN O’RILEY, Hot Springs, 10-88 rushing, 1 TD 
HAROLD ROSS, Greenbrier, 20-28 passing, 293, 3 TDs 
TRIP SMITH, Beebe, 34-175 rushing, 3 TDs 
PIERRE STRONG, LR McClellan, 6-78 rushing, 3 TDs 
JAREN WATKINS, Pulaski Academy, 12-103 rushing, 2 TDs 
CLASS 4A 
TYE BROWN, Star City, 13-18 passing, 168, 3 TDs; 2-point conversion pass 
HUNTER CHANDLER, 17-28 passing, 309, 1 TD; 2 TDs rushing 
REECE COATES, Pocahontas, 5-10 passing, 84, 3 TDs; 53-yard TD run 
TRACE COLLIE, Malvern, 3 TDs (2 rushing, 1 passing) 
DENNIS DANIELS, Warren, 15-141 rushing 
ANDREW ENGLE, Heber Springs, 8-131 receiving; 1 TD rushing 
ZYRIQUE GEANS, 99-yard INT return for TD 
DESHAWN GULLEDGE, Bald Knob, 11-123 rushing, 5 TDS; 6-76 receiving. 
T.J. HAMMONDS, Pulaski Robinson, 4-65 rushing, 4 TDs 
DOMINIC HARP, Bald Knob, 25-142 rushing 
XAVIER HODGE, Lonoke, 2 rushing TDs and a 62-yard fumble recovery return to a TD 
HAYDEN LASSITER, Warren, 18-29 passing, 162, 5 TDs 
JAMARI McCOLLUM, Malvern, 14-120 rushing, 3 TDs 
MARKELL SCOTT, Pine Bluff Dollarway, 184 rushing, 1 TD 
BLAKE WYNN, Star City, 10-123 receiving, 3 TDs; 2-point conversion reception 
CLASS 3A 
ALEX FRANCIS, Harding Academy, 17-28 passing, 248, 4 TDs 
ALLIE FREEMAN, Episcopal Collegiate, 6-147 receiving , 2 TDs; 4-91 rushing, 1 TD 
DANTE JONES, Horatio, 77 rushing, 3 TDs 
DALTON KOCH, Harding Academy, 80-yard punt return for TD; 2-yard fumble return for TD 
CHRIS KONKLER, Mountain View, 28-192 rushing, 4 TDs; defensive INT 
JORDAN JOHNSON, Glen Rose, 21-146 rushing 2 TDs 
NICK MARSHALL, Jessieville, 24-149 rushing, 2 TDs
